scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && npm i" "cd server && npm i"
scripts.dev: concurrently -P "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev -- {@}"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.start: concurrently -P "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run start -- {@}"
